channel.title: CVE Feed for Fedora Project -- 389-ds-base
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fedora Project -- 389-ds-base

item.title: CVE-2018-14638|2024-08-05T09:38:13.183Z -- fedora%20project -- 389-ds-base
item.description: A flaw was found in 389-ds-base before version 1.3.8.4-13. The process ns-slapd crashes in delete_passwdPolicy function when persistent search connections are terminated unexpectedly leading to remote denial of service.
